attributes.action: Roll out the principles of the White Paper, "Trust, Assurance and Safety - The Regulation of Health Professionals in the 21st Century", to become applicable to Members of Parliament.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The above white paper contains stringent provisions aimed at preventing a repeat of outrages such as the Shipman murders. It is apparent that Members of Parliament are also in positions of trust, and able to send good men to their deaths without an adequate Evidence Base. If Members of Parliament were to undergo regular Revalidation, with Appraisal from independent assessors, this country would be a safer place.
